name: Mr Pancake
description:
GAME MADE IN 3 DAYS

Short game about pancake, who is trying to escape kitchen, whrere he was born, and explore world outside.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys or Space Key (for jumping)

You are playing as pancake. Be careful around knives, water and fire. You will find hungry teeth on your way. They can eat a piece of you, so you are smaller and you could go to tighter places. BUT don't let them eat you completely.

Programming, Level Design, Sound Design: Jan Pospíšil

Art, Animation, Music: Jonáš Smrčka
